name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-typespec-repairs-apikey
title: Manage repairs using Microsoft 365 Copilot
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that allows you to read, create, update and delete items from a Repairs system. The agent uses an API plugin to connect to an API-key protected API.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that allows you to read, create, update and delete items from a Repairs system. The agent uses an API plugin to connect to an API-key protected API.
